00025 CGraphics::CGraphics() : m_TotalFonts(3)
00026 {
00027         m_FontColor=0;
00028         m_FontTransparent=true;
00029         m_FontActive=CourierBold13x18;
00030         m_FontAlignment=TOPLEFT;
00031         m_FontData.resize(m_TotalFonts);
00032         for(int i=0;i<m_TotalFonts;i++)
00033                 m_FontData[i]=NULL;
00034 }
00035 
00036 CGraphics::CGraphics(UINT32 FontColor, bool FontTransparent, FONTALIGNMENT FontAlignment,
00037                                          BITMAPFONT FontActive) : m_TotalFonts(3)
00038 {
00039         m_FontColor=FontColor;
00040         m_FontTransparent=FontTransparent;
00041         m_FontActive=FontActive;
00042         m_FontAlignment=FontAlignment;
00043         m_FontData.resize(m_TotalFonts);
00044         for(int i=0;i<m_TotalFonts;i++)
00045                 m_FontData[i]=NULL;
00046 }
00047 
00048 CGraphics::~CGraphics()
00049 {
00050         for(int i=0;i<m_TotalFonts;i++)
00051         {
00052                 if (m_FontData[i]!=NULL)
00053                         delete m_FontData[i];
00054         }
00055 }

00057 bool CGraphics::Line(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Start, const CPoint2D<INT16>& End, CPixelGroup& PixelGroup)
00058 {
00059         T2DInt Start1, End1;
00060         Start1.x=Start.GetX();
00061         Start1.y=Start.GetY();
00062         End1.x=End.GetX();
00063         End1.y=End.GetY();
00064         if (k_GraphicsGenerateLine(Start1,End1, PixelGroup.GetTPixelGroupPtr())==false)
00065         {
00066                 ostringstream ost;
00067                 ost << "CGraphics::Line() Failed generating line points" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00068                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00069                 return false;
00070         }
00071         return true;
00072 }
00073

00254 bool CGraphics::PlotString(const char* str, const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, CStdImage& Img)
00255 {
00256         return PlotString(str,Pos.GetX(),Pos.GetY(),Img);
00257 }
00258 
00259 bool CGraphics::PlotString(const char* str, int x, int y, CStdImage& Img)
00260 {
00261         if (m_FontData[m_FontActive]==NULL)
00262         {
00263                 InitFont();
00264         }
00265         UINT8* pFontData;
00266         UINT8 ASCIIStart;
00267         int TotalChars,CharWidth,CharHeight;
00268         GetFontInfo(m_FontActive,&pFontData,ASCIIStart,TotalChars,CharWidth,CharHeight);
00269         CPoint2D<int> P(x,y);
00270         // adjust P according to alignent value
00271         if (AdjustAlignment(str,P)==false)
00272                 return false;
00273         int Size=GetSizeString(str);
00274         int Count=0;
00275         while(Count<Size)
00276         {
00277                 if (PlotChar(*(str+Count),P,Img)==false)
00278                         return false;
00279                 P += CPoint2D<int>(CharWidth,0);
00280                 Count++;
00281         }
00282         return true;
00283 }
00284 
00285 bool CGraphics::GetFontInfo(BITMAPFONT Font,UINT8** ppFontData, UINT8& ASCIIStart, int& TotalChars,int& CharWidth,int& CharHeight)
00286 {
00287         *ppFontData=m_FontData[m_FontActive];
00288         switch(Font)
00289         {
00290         case CourierBold13x18:
00291                 {
00292                         ASCIIStart=31;
00293                         TotalChars=256;
00294                         CharWidth=13;
00295                         CharHeight=18;
00296                         break;
00297                 }
00298         case Terminal12x16:
00299                 {
00300                         ASCIIStart=0;
00301                         TotalChars=256;
00302                         CharWidth=12;
00303                         CharHeight=16;
00304                         break;
00305                 }
00306         case Courier8x12:
00307                 {
00308                         ASCIIStart=0;
00309                         TotalChars=256;
00310                         CharWidth=8;
00311                         CharHeight=12;
00312                         break;
00313                 }
00314         default:
00315                 {
00316                         ostringstream ost;
00317                         ost << "CGraphics::PlotChar() Unknown font is active" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00318                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00319                         return false;
00320                 }
00321         }
00322         return true;
00323 }
00324 
00330 
00331 bool CGraphics::AdjustAlignment(const char* str, CPoint2D<int>& Pos)
00332 {
00333         UINT8* pFontData;
00334         UINT8 ASCIIStart;
00335         int TotalChars,CharWidth,CharHeight;
00336         GetFontInfo(m_FontActive,&pFontData,ASCIIStart,TotalChars,CharWidth,CharHeight);
00337         switch(m_FontAlignment)
00338         {
00339         case TOPLEFT:
00340                 {
00341                         // do nothing
00342                         break;
00343                 }
00344         case BOTTOMLEFT:
00345                 {
00346                         Pos.SetY(Pos.GetY()-CharHeight);
00347                         break;
00348                 }
00349         case TOPMID:
00350                 {
00351                         int Size=GetSizeString(str);
00352                         Pos.SetX(Pos.GetX()-Round(Size*CharWidth/2));
00353                         break;
00354                 }
00355         case BOTTOMMID:
00356                 {
00357                         int Size=GetSizeString(str);
00358                         Pos.SetX(Pos.GetX()-Round(Size*CharWidth/2));
00359                         Pos.SetY(Pos.GetY()-CharHeight);
00360                         break;
00361                 }
00362         case TOPRIGHT:
00363                 {
00364                         int Size=GetSizeString(str);
00365                         Pos.SetX(Pos.GetX()-Round(Size*CharWidth));
00366                         break;
00367                 }
00368         case BOTTOMRIGHT:
00369                 {
00370                         int Size=GetSizeString(str);
00371                         Pos.SetX(Pos.GetX()-Round(Size*CharWidth));
00372                         Pos.SetY(Pos.GetY()-CharHeight);
00373                         break;
00374                 }
00375         default:
00376                 {
00377                         ostringstream ost;
00378                         ost << "CGraphics::AdjustAlignment() Unknown alignment value" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00379                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00380                         return false;
00381                 }
00382         }
00383         return true;
00384 }
00385 
00386 int CGraphics::GetSizeString(const char* str)
00387 {
00388         int Size=0;
00389         const char* s=str;
00390         while(*s!='\0')
00391         {
00392                 Size++;
00393                 s++;
00394         }
00395         return Size;
00396 }

00398 
00399 bool CGraphics::PlotChar(char ch, const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, CStdImage& Img)
00400 {
00401         int TotalChars;
00402         int CharWidth;
00403         int CharHeight;
00404         UINT8 ASCIIStart;
00405         UINT8 c=(UINT8)ch;
00406         UINT8* pFontData=NULL;
00407         int MinX=Img.GetMinX();
00408         int MaxX=Img.GetMaxX();
00409         int MinY=Img.GetMinY();
00410         int MaxY=Img.GetMaxY();
00411         if (GetFontInfo(m_FontActive,&pFontData,ASCIIStart,TotalChars,CharWidth,CharHeight)==false)
00412                 return false;
00413         int x,y,k,Index;
00414         if ((c<ASCIIStart) || (c>=TotalChars)) c=ASCIIStart; // if character not used, print the lowest available
00415         c-=ASCIIStart;
00416         int ScanLength=(CharWidth*(TotalChars-ASCIIStart))/8+1; // in bytes
00417         int Offset=CharWidth*(int)c;
00418         int StartIndex=(int)Offset/8;
00419         int BitOffsetF=Offset % 8;
00420         // number of whole bytes in width of character to be read after the first part of a byte has been read
00421         int WholeBytes=(CharWidth-(8-BitOffsetF))/8; 
00422         int RemainingBits=CharWidth-((8-BitOffsetF)+8*WholeBytes); // 5
00423 
00424         for(y=0; y<CharHeight; y++)
00425         {
00426                 x=Pos.GetX();
00427                 Index=y*ScanLength+StartIndex;
00428                 // run in part of first byte
00429                 for(k=0;k<8-BitOffsetF;k++)
00430                 {
00431                         UINT8 PlotVal=pFontData[Index];
00432                         PlotVal <<= BitOffsetF + k;
00433                         PlotVal >>= 7;
00434                         if (PlotVal==0)
00435                         {
00436                                 if ((x>MinX) && (x<MaxX) && (Pos.GetY()+y>MinY) && (Pos.GetY()+y<MaxY))
00437                                         Img.SetPixelFast(x,Pos.GetY()+y,m_FontColor);
00438                         }
00439                         else if (m_FontTransparent==false)
00440                         {
00441                                 if ((x>MinX) && (x<MaxX) && (Pos.GetY()+y>MinY) && (Pos.GetY()+y<MaxY))
00442                                         Img.SetPixelFast(x,Pos.GetY()+y,m_FontBackgroundColor);
00443                         }
00444                         x++;
00445                 }
00446                 // run in whole bytes inbetween
00447                 for(int i=0; i<WholeBytes; i++)
00448                 {
00449                         Index++;
00450                         for(k=0; k<8; k++)
00451                         {
00452                                 UINT8 PlotVal=pFontData[Index];
00453                                 PlotVal <<= k;
00454                                 PlotVal >>= 7;
00455                                 if (PlotVal==0)
00456                                 {
00457                                         if ((x>MinX) && (x<MaxX) && (Pos.GetY()+y>MinY) && (Pos.GetY()+y<MaxY))
00458                                                 Img.SetPixelFast(x,Pos.GetY()+y,m_FontColor);
00459                                 }
00460                                 else if (m_FontTransparent==false)
00461                                 {
00462                                         if ((x>MinX) && (x<MaxX) && (Pos.GetY()+y>MinY) && (Pos.GetY()+y<MaxY))
00463                                                 Img.SetPixelFast(x,Pos.GetY()+y,m_FontBackgroundColor);
00464                                 }
00465                                 x++;
00466                         }
00467                 }
00468                 // run in part of last byte
00469                 Index++;
00470                 for(k=0;k<RemainingBits;k++)
00471                 {
00472                         UINT8 PlotVal=pFontData[Index];
00473                         PlotVal <<= k;
00474                         PlotVal >>= 7;
00475                         if (PlotVal==0)
00476                         {
00477                                 if ((x>MinX) && (x<MaxX) && (Pos.GetY()+y>MinY) && (Pos.GetY()+y<MaxY))
00478                                         Img.SetPixelFast(x,Pos.GetY()+y,m_FontColor);
00479                         }
00480                         else if (m_FontTransparent==false)
00481                         {
00482                                 if ((x>MinX) && (x<MaxX) && (Pos.GetY()+y>MinY) && (Pos.GetY()+y<MaxY))
00483                                         Img.SetPixelFast(x,Pos.GetY()+y,m_FontBackgroundColor);
00484                         }
00485                         x++;
00486                 }
00487         }
00488         return true;
00489 }
00490 
00491 
00492 bool CGraphics::InitFont()
00493 {
00494         if (m_FontData[m_FontActive]!=NULL)
00495         {
00496                 // allready initialize - do nothing
00497                 return true;
00498         }
00499         switch(m_FontActive)
00500         {
00501         case CourierBold13x18:
00502                 {
00503                         if (m_FontData[m_FontActive]==NULL)
00504                                 InitCourierBold13x18();
00505                         break;
00506                 }
00507         case Courier8x12:
00508                 {
00509                         if (m_FontData[m_FontActive]==NULL)
00510                                 InitCourier8x12();
00511                         break;
00512                 }
00513         case Terminal12x16:
00514                 {
00515                         if (m_FontData[m_FontActive]==NULL)
00516                                 InitTerminal12x16();
00517                         break;
00518                 }
00519         default:
00520                 {
00521                         ostringstream ost;
00522                         ost << "CGraphics::InitFont() Unknown font is active" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00523                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00524                         return false;
00525                 }
00526         }
00527         return true;
00528 }

00829         };
00830         // following two variables must correspond to numbers of scanlines in each variable above, 1 and 2 must be the same
00831         int ScanLines1And2=7; // number of scanlines stored in each variable xxxxData1 and xxxxData2
00832         int ScanLines3=2; // number of scanlines stored in variable xxxxData3
00833         // following two variables can be found in output file written by the font data generator
00834         int TotalNumbers=6160; // total numbers defining font
00835         int NumbersPrScanLine=385; // numbers pr scanline
00836         
00837         UINT8* pFontData=(UINT8*)malloc(TotalNumbers);
00838         memcpy(pFontData,Data1,ScanLines1And2*NumbersPrScanLine);
00839         memcpy(pFontData+ScanLines1And2*NumbersPrScanLine,Data2,ScanLines1And2*NumbersPrScanLine);
00840         memcpy(pFontData+2*ScanLines1And2*NumbersPrScanLine,Data3,ScanLines3*NumbersPrScanLine);
00841         
00842         // set to actual font
00843         m_FontData[Terminal12x16]=pFontData;
00844 }
00845 
00846 } // end ipl namespace
